title: Error: 'ascii' codec can't encode character '\u2019' in position 133: ordinal not in range(128)
concept: In a future where memories can be bought and sold, a memory-smuggler stumbles upon a black-market memory of an event that hasn’t happened yet — the destruction of Earth in exactly seven days.
